actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to prevent any alien who is not lawfully admitted for permanent residence from obtaining in-State tuition rates at public institutions of higher education, and for other purposes.

titles.title: A bill to prevent any alien who is not lawfully admitted for permanent residence from obtaining in-State tuition rates at public institutions of higher education, and for other purposes.
A bill to prevent any alien who is not lawfully admitted for permanent residence from obtaining in-State tuition rates at public institutions of higher education, and for other purposes.
